tag_list: eco, textbook, textbooks, college, college-textbooks, amazon, amazon-com, used-textbooks, used-books, green, eco-living, green-jobs, recycling, used-college-textbooks, buying-textbooks, selling-textbooks
overview: EcoTextbooks.com is committed to preserving our natural resources and environment by helping to reduce the factors that contribute to air pollution and global warming through the recycling of textbooks. Each year millions of trees are cut down to produce college and high school level textbooks and many of these books end up in landfills. Eco Textbooks recognizes this waste and has committed itself to being green by promoting the recycling of used textbooks, visit our resources page to visit sites that we think promote our message. http://www.EcoTextbooks.com
